name: The Element of Surprise!
description:
Synopsis:

Play as a miner trying to capitalise on the large amounts of "Surprise" on his land. Get as many points as possible in the time!

Leave your high scores in the comments!

Controls:

A/D or Left/Right to move

Space to jump

Click to dig

Left Ctrl to place bomb (Post Jam only)

Changelog:

22/12/17

Post-Jam Build 1:

- Added borders to the world

- Added ability to place bombs

- Rocks (now with a chance to be unbreakable) are affected by gravity and can kill you :)

- Extra time can be picked up

- Halved mine times from previous version

- Other miscellaneous fixes of things I overlooked during the jam
